com.robindrew.trading.price.candle.format.pcf

Class PcfFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robindrew.trading.price.candle.format.pcf.PcfFormat

  • public final class PcfFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    The PCF (PriceCandleFormat) file format is much faster to read than traditional text formats. The file size is similar to or better than the compressed line format, but candles are deserialized directly without decompression. Read and write times are also very fast, however as a binary format it is not human readable.
    • Candles are minute-level accuracy.
    • Candle times are in UTC.
    • Files are monthly.
    See Also:
    PifFormat
